alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 05 at 1:29PM PST until January 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Elko County and Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
